vclaim: Wyoming state Sen. Anthony Bouchard revealed in a Facebook Live video and statements to the press that he impregnated a girl when she was 14 and he was 18 years of age, and he compared it to Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."
title: Did Anthony Bouchard Compare Impregnating a 14-Year-Old When He Was 18 to ‘Romeo and Juliet’?
subtitle: Wyoming state Sen. Anthony Bouchard reportedly made the comment in a Facebook Live video and in statements to a local newspaper.
author: Bethania Palma
